attributes.action: Make recreational weed legal for personal use.
attributes.additional_details: Alcohol and cigarettes are legal and they have been proven to be just as if not more addicting then weed the only differences being that weed is beneficial for certain health problems and can help calm people down without long term health issues where as alcohol and cigarettes cause hundreds and thousands of deaths every year. Laws would be put in place to control the use of weed but it would work just like alcohol or cigarettes and would fund itself if sold at a reasonable price.
attributes.background: Weed has been medically proven to have 0 long term health damaging effects on anyone over the age of 21, has been proven to help certain medical illnesses and stress and could be beneficial for the economy, employment rate and crime rate as it being illegal causes lots of problems in the public.
